issues.description: The template repository’s ASM file references the register “ecc”, while both the problem statement and the solution use the correct register name “ecx”. Students directed to rename “ecc” to “ecx” may be confused if the template and solution aren’t aligned. This inconsistency forces students to map two different identifiers to the same concept, adding unnecessary cognitive load.
issues.suggested_fix: In the template repository’s helloWorld.asm, rename all occurrences of the register “ecc” to the correct name “ecx” so that it matches both the problem statement instructions and the reference solution.
